definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: St. Joseph lighthouse after a winter storm.
As l struggled through the snowdrifts, l had just about reached the lowest Point in my life.
sentences.chinese: 处在人生低谷的我在暴风雪中艰难地行走着。

sentences.english: Chicago endured blizzard conditions and thundersnow, along with half a meter of snow accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥处于暴风雪和雷暴天气，会有半米左右的积雪。

sentences.english: However, as the storm impact, the train on and off.
sentences.chinese: 但由于暴风雪影响，该列车时开时停。

sentences.english: There must have been a blizzard the day she and Stannis wed.
sentences.chinese: 她和史坦尼斯婚礼当天肯定有暴风雪。

sentences.english: Snowstorms threw communications and transportation into disorder.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雪使交通运输陷入混乱。

sentences.english: Severe snowstorms wreaked havoc on traffic.
sentences.chinese: 猛烈的暴风雪造成了交通混乱。

sentences.english: Years of doubt and disbelief vanished like the passing storm.
sentences.chinese: 多年来的怀疑不信任感已随暴风雪的消失而消失。

sentences.english: MAYOR BILL DE BLASIO, (D) NEW YORK: We are facing most likely one of the largest snowstorms in the history of the city.
sentences.chinese: 你可能正面临着这座城市历史上最严重的一次暴风雪。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Santa's Arrival, Santa weathers out a snowstorm as he makes every effort to deliver toys on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人在天气变化暴风雪努力在圣诞夜给予玩具。

sentences.english: So time became lumbersome and little, snowstorms broke the door of the heart easily.
sentences.chinese: 于是时间变得沉重而渺小，暴风雪轻易破了薄薄的门。

sentences.english: The plane was held up for one hour because of a snowstorm.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雪使飞机推迟了一个钟头。

sentences.english: The snowstorm added to our difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雪增加了我们的困难。
但是，暴风雪没有松懈下来的迹象。

sentences.english: I began to feel that no one would dare the dangers of a snowstorm.
sentences.chinese: 我开始想，哪会有人敢冒暴风雪的危险。

definition: cold air current/cold ocean current/cold stream
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to freeze over/to ice over/icebound/to shelve (a proposal etc)
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
